mapper.select: select oid, uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money from yto.myorder where oid = #{oid}
SELECT oid, uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money FROM yto.myorder WHERE uid=#{uid}
SELECT oid, uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money FROM yto.myorder WHERE oid=#{oid}
select oid, uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money from yto.myorder limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yto.myorder(uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money) values (#{uid}, #{onumber}, #{wnumber}, #{itemtype}, #{remark}, #{weight}, now(), #{ystatus}, #{money})

insert into yto.myorder(uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money) values
(#{entity.uid}, #{entity.onumber}, #{entity.wnumber}, #{entity.itemtype}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.weight}, #{entity.otime}, #{entity.ystatus}, #{entity.money})

insert into yto.myorder(uid, onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money) values
(#{entity.uid}, #{entity.onumber}, #{entity.wnumber}, #{entity.itemtype}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.weight}, #{entity.otime}, #{entity.ystatus}, #{entity.money})
on duplicate key update uid = values(uid) , onumber = values(onumber) , wnumber = values(wnumber) , itemtype = values(itemtype) , remark = values(remark) , weight = values(weight) , otime = values(otime) , ystatus = values(ystatus) , money = values(money)
mapper.update:
update yto.myorder
uid = #{uid},
onumber = #{onumber},
wnumber = #{wnumber},
itemtype = #{itemtype},
remark = #{remark},
weight = #{weight},
otime = #{otime},
ystatus = #{ystatus},
money = #{money},
where oid = #{oid}
mapper.select: select oid, uid, mo.onumber, wnumber, itemtype, remark, weight, otime, ystatus, money from yto.myorder mo,yto.order_sender os where mo.onumber=os.onumber and mo.ystatus= #{status} and os.sdistrict = #{area} limit #{offset},#{limit}
select count(mo.oid) from yto.myorder mo,yto.order_sender os where mo.onumber=os.onumber and mo.ystatus= #{status} and os.sdistrict = #{area}
